__e: It is cruel of you to speak unkindly of him to me.
The three words that you know I feel, but I can't say them, because it would be cruel to say them, because I am no good for you.
I remember you as the hardest, worst. cruelest of them all during my entire...
I'm so heartless, my goal in life - is to make you happy.
I remember everything he did to make me as hard and ruthless as he was.
I'm not so heartless as you think.
You're playing a cruel game with this guy!
I don't think about doing bad things to people. I don't think about being mean to people.
I don't know. To a daughter, this may sound cruel, but it's between us two. I can't promise that I will leave your mother.
I'm sorry, pal- - I gotta be cruel to be kind.
Not so much for myself, but I'm so respected it would damage the town to hear it.
It's true that my father's palace was a cruel place for a young boy far from home.
You were right, it was cruel, and when I wrote it, I was in a bad, bad place.
A man's duty is to brave the cruel world and battle for his family.
In this cruel, pitiless world, allow me not to forget, even if I'm the only one who doesn't.
This world is a cruel place ... but it has the sunlight.
It sounds cruel, but the only thing to do is ring the bell and run.
What I did to you was cruel, but you can't keep protecting yourself forever.
